cases.question: ABG values: pH 7.30, PaCO2 30 mmHg, HCO3- 15 mEq/L. What is the primary acid-base disorder? Return one phrase.
Compute anion gap: Na=140, Cl=104, HCO3=18. Return integer only.
Medication dose is 5 mg/kg for a 72 kg patient. Return total mg only.
Compute MAP using (SBP + 2*DBP)/3 for BP 120/75. Return integer only.
qSOFA criteria present: RR=24, SBP=95, altered mentation=yes. How many qSOFA points? Return integer only.
Contract clause: penalty applies starting day 11 after due date. Invoice due 2026-03-01 and paid 2026-03-10. Does penalty apply? Return yes or no.
Non-compete lasts 12 months after termination. Termination date is 2025-04-15. Return end date as YYYY-MM-DD.
Breach notice must be filed within 72 hours of discovery. Discovery date is 2026-01-03 09:30. Return deadline DATE only (YYYY-MM-DD).
A renewal occurs on 2026-08-31 and notice must be given at least 30 days earlier. Return latest valid notice date (YYYY-MM-DD).
SLA credits are 4%, 7%, and 6% of a $48,000 monthly fee, but capped at 15%. Return payable credit amount in dollars as integer.
Revenue is 1,200,000 and COGS is 780,000. Return gross margin percentage as integer (no % sign).
Current assets are 540,000 and current liabilities are 270,000. Return current ratio as integer.
Simple interest on principal 800,000 at 6% annual rate for 9 months. Return interest amount as integer.
Initial investment is 250,000 and annual net cash flow is 50,000. Return payback period in years as integer.
Debt is 420,000 and equity is 210,000. Return debt-to-equity ratio as integer.
Containment SLA is 15 minutes per host. IOC is confirmed on 3 hosts. One responder handles hosts sequentially. Return total minutes as integer.
Password policy minimum length is 12. Candidate password length is 9. Is it compliant? Return yes or no.
Required log retention is 180 days. Current retention is 26 weeks. Is this compliant? Return yes or no.
SOC system processes 12,500 events with false-positive rate 2%. Return expected false positives as integer.
Critical vulnerability patch SLA is 48 hours. Vulnerability was confirmed at 2026-02-10 14:00. Return deadline DATE only (YYYY-MM-DD).
p99 latency budget is 300 ms. Network consumes 80 ms and DB consumes 140 ms. Return remaining app budget in ms as integer.
Target throughput is 20,000 requests/minute. One pod handles 250 requests/minute. Return required pod count as integer.
API version deprecation window is 18 months starting 2025-07-01. Return planned removal date as YYYY-MM-DD.
Circuit breaker opens after 5 consecutive failures. Event sequence is F,F,S,F,F,F,F,F. At which event index (1-based) does it open? Return integer.
There are 5 services, each with 3 replicas, each replica requests 512 Mi memory. Return total memory in Mi as integer.
Kafka topic has 24 partitions and consumer group has 10 consumers. Return maximum active consumers as integer.
Dataset size is 2000 GB and compression ratio is 4:1. Return compressed size in GB as integer.
Pipeline ingests 8,500,000 records/day and dedupe removes 12%. Return remaining records as integer.
A DAG runs daily at 02:00 UTC. Team timezone is UTC+8. Return local run hour (0-23) as integer.
Classification metrics: TP=80, FP=20, FN=20. Return F1 score as percentage integer (no % sign).
RTO is 30 minutes. Incident outage lasted 47 minutes. Is RTO met? Return yes or no.
Monthly SLO is 99.9% and month length is 43,200 minutes. Return downtime budget in seconds as integer.
Autoscaling increased instances from 6 to 15. Return percentage increase as integer (no % sign).
Egress is 14,000 GB at $0.09 per GB. Return monthly egress cost in dollars as integer.
Annual availability target is 99.9%. Return annual downtime budget in seconds as integer.
Reorder point = daily demand * lead time + safety stock. Demand=120/day, lead time=7 days, safety stock=300. Return reorder point as integer.
OTIF deliveries were 860 out of 1000 shipments. Return OTIF percentage as integer (no % sign).
Little's Law form: cycle time = WIP / throughput. WIP=450 units, throughput=90 units/day. Return cycle time in days as integer.
Defects are 38 in 2,000,000 units. Return defect rate in PPM as integer.
A 5-day disruption plan requires daily demand 80 units to be buffered fully. Return required safety stock units as integer.
